body_html:
@MarkDaoust the windows install webpage now shows CUDA 9.0, but shows cuDNN 6.0, and requires minimum compute capability of 3.0

The ubuntu install webpage, on the other hand, shows CUDA 9.0, cuDNN 7.0, and requires minimum compute capability of 3.5.

Just want to confirm these are correct. If so it means we can't use cuDNN 7.0(.x) on windows??
